Package: com.github.amkay.gradle.gitflow.strategy

[Groovy] Class AbstractStrategy

    • com.github.amkay.gradle.gitflow.strategy.AbstractStrategy
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      Strategy

      abstract class AbstractStrategy
extends Object

      The base class of all strategies used to infer the version. This is a helper class that holds common functionality of all strategies like logging and retrieving branch names and prefixes from the config of Git.

      Authors:
      Max KÃ¤ufer
